title: Atlantic Media Taps Finnegan As COO
content:
Atlantic Media has promoted Michael Finnegan from CFO and senior VP, corporate development, to chief operating officer. Finnegan has been with the company since 2011. 
 
“He [Finnegan] is as clear a thinker as any I’ve worked with,” wrote Atlantic Media CEO and chairman  David Bradley , in a memo. “I’ve come to trust his thinking and judgment coping with the (fear-inspiring) complexity of modern media. Against all odds, Atlantic Media grew 20 percent last year; against all odds, it will do the same this year as well. This is a team accomplishment, but it’s hard to overstate Michael Finnegan’s centrality to that team.” 
 
Finnegan’s appointment is effective immediately.
